009package imagingbook.common.util.bits;
010
011/**
012 * This class implements {@link BitVector} with internal 64-bit 
013 * {@code long} data.
014 * @author WB
015 */
016public class BitVector64 implements BitVector {
017        
018        private static final int WL = 64;
019        
020        private final long[] data;
021        private final int length;
022        
023        public BitVector64(int length) {
024                this.length = length;
025                int n = (length % WL == 0) ? length / WL : length / WL + 1;     // word count
026                this.data = new long[n];
027        }
028        
029        public BitVector64(byte[] bytes) {
030                this(bytes.length);
031                for (int i = 0; i < bytes.length; i++) {
032                        if (bytes[i] != 0) {
033                                this.set(i);
034                        }
035                }
036        }
037        
038        public BitVector64(boolean[] bools) {
039                this(bools.length);
040                for (int i = 0; i < bools.length; i++) {
041                        this.set(i, bools[i]);
042                }
043        }
044        
045        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
046
047        @Override
048        public int getLength() {
049                return this.length;
050        }
051        
052        @Override
053        public boolean get(int i) {
054                if (i < 0 || i >= length) {
055                        throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException("illegal index " + i);
056                }
057                final long mask = 1L << (i % WL);
058                return (data[i / WL] & mask) != 0L;
059        }
060        
061        @Override
062        public void set(int i) {
063                if (i < 0 || i >= length) {
064                        throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException("illegal index " + i);
065                }
066                final int j = i / WL;   // word index
067                final long mask = 1L << (i % WL);
068                data[j] =  data[j] | mask;
069        }
070        
071        @Override
072        public void unset(int i) {
073                if (i < 0 || i >= length) {
074                        throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException("illegal index " + i);
075                }
076                final int j = i / WL;   // word index
077                long mask = 1L << (i % WL);
078                data[j] =  data[j] & ~mask;
079        }
080        
081        @Override
082        public void setAll() {
083                for (int j = 0; j < data.length; j++) {
084                        data[j] = ~0L;
085                }
086        }
087
088        @Override
089        public void unsetAll() {
090                for (int j = 0; j < data.length; j++) {
091                        data[j] = 0L;
092                }
093        }
094                
095        
096        @Override
097        public String toString() {
098                StringBuilder buf = new StringBuilder();
099                buf.append(BitVector64.class.getSimpleName() + "[");
100                for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
101                        buf.append(this.get(i) ? "1" : "0");
102                }
103                buf.append("]");
104                return buf.toString();
105        }
106        
107//      public String toHexString() {
108//              StringBuilder buf = new StringBuilder();
109//              buf.append(BitVector64.class.getSimpleName() + "[");
110//              for (int i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
111//                      buf.append(Long.toHexString(data[i]));
112//              }
113//              buf.append("]");
114//              return buf.toString();
115//      }
116        
117        //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
118        
119        public static void main(String[] args) {
120                int K = 99;
121                BitVector64 b = new BitVector64(K);
122                
123                System.out.println(b.toString());
124                b.setAll();
125                System.out.println(b.toString());
126                b.unsetAll();
127                System.out.println(b.toString());
128                
129//              System.out.println(b.toHexString());
130                
131                System.out.println();
132                
133                for (int i = 0; i < b.length; i++) {
134                        b.set(i);
135                        System.out.println(b.toString());
136                        b.unset(i);
137                }
138        }
139
140}
